en.name: MCX Rattler upper receiver
en.description: The upper for the MCX Rattler PDW, the smaller cousin to the MCX. Ships standard with a 5.5 inch barrel, pairing sweet with any .30 cal suppressor.

en.name: MCX Rattler upper receiver (FDE)
en.description: The upper for the MCX Rattler PDW, the smaller cousin to the MCX. Ships standard with a 5.5 inch barrel, pairing sweet with any .30 cal suppressor.

en.name: MPX/MCX folding visor stock
en.description: SIG SAUER factory replacement folding visor stock installs easily on your MCX/MPX via the receivers 1913 interface.

en.name: MCX Rattler .300 BLK 5.5 inch barrel
en.description: A 5.5 inch barrel for the MCX Rattler, chambered in .300 BLK. This will not work with standard MCX uppers due to the modified chamber geometry.

en.name: MCX Rattler gas block
en.description: A gas block designed for the MCX Rattler assault rifle, manufactured by SIG Sauer.

en.name: MCX Three Prong .300 blackout Flash Hider
en.description: A three prong flash hider for the .300 blackout MCX, manufactured by SIG Sauer.

en.name: MCX Three Prong 5.56x45 Flash Hider
en.description: A three prong flash hider for the 5.56x45 MCX, manufactured by SIG Sauer.

en.name: MCX Rattler pistol grip (FDE)
en.description: A polymer pistol grip for MCX assault rifles, manufactured by SIG Sauer.

en.name: MCX Rattler pistol grip (BLK)
en.description: A polymer pistol grip for MCX assault rifles, manufactured by SIG Sauer.

en.name: MCX Rattler M-lok handguard (BLK)
en.description: A handguard specifically designed for the MCX Rattler.

en.name: MCX Rattler M-lok handguard (FDE)
en.description: A handguard specifically designed for the MCX Rattler.

en.name: MCX Rattler Canebrake Mlok handguard
en.description: The Canebrake handguard for the Sig Sauer MCX Rattler.

en.name: SIG MCX 5.56x45 assault rifle
en.description: The 5.56x45 MCX line, designed and manufactured by SIG Sauer, is available in both semi-automatic and automatic versions and features a short-stroke gas piston system, which is inherited from the earlier SIG MPX submachine gun.

en.name: MCX 5.56x45 171mm barrel
en.description: A 171mm barrel for MCX-based weapons, chambered in 5.56x45. You asked, I delivered. I CAST SUPER SLOW BULLET!!

en.name: MCX 5.56x45 229mm barrel
en.description: A 229mm barrel for MCX-based weapons, chambered in 5.56x45. You will not have good ballistics.
